fullText: This Broadway musical, based on the 1990 movie, works overtime to sand down the rougher edges of its source material, but the result feels disappointingly sanitized and generic.
dtliExcerpt: This Broadway musical, based on the 1990 movie, works overtime to sand down the rougher edges of its source material, but the result feels disappointingly sanitized and generic.
bwwExcerpt: Directed and choreographed as if on automatic pilot by Jerry Mitchell, 'Pretty Woman: The Musical' has a book by the original film's director, Garry Marshall (who died in 2016), and screenwriter, J.F. Lawton, with songs by Bryan Adams and Jim Vallance. Its creators have hewed suffocatingly close to the film's story, gags and dialogue.
showScoreExcerpt: This Broadway musical, based on the 1990 movie, works overtime to sand down the rougher edges of its source material, but the result feels disappointingly sanitized and generic.
